```python
sum_value = sum(arr[i-1] for i in range(1, len(arr)))
```
In each iteration, the algorithm selects the minimum element in the unsorted part of the array and moves it to its correct position. Therefore, the sum of the elements in the unsorted part after each iteration should be equal to the initial sum. This invariant ensures that the algorithm maintains the partial correctness of the program.
